Question
========

A person achieves a score of 10.7 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 7.4 with a standard deviation 0.3. The z-score of the person with 10.7 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 11
* 11.64
* 12.24

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 11: Correct
* 11.64: Incorrect
* 12.24: Incorrect
